import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import emailjs from "@emailjs/browser"; import { useNavigate, useLocation } from "react-router-dom"; import { Helmet } from "react-helmet"; import Me from "./Me.jpeg"; export default function HireMe() { // Contact Form const navigate = useNavigate(); const location = useLocation(); const form = useRef(); const [isFormSubmitted, setFormSubmitted] = useState(false); // Track form submission useEffect(() => { if (!isFormSubmitted && location.pathname === "/hire-me") { navigate("/", { replace: true }); // Redirect to the homepage if form is not submitted and the current URL is /hire-me } else if (isFormSubmitted && location.pathname !== "/thank-you") { navigate("/thank-you"); // Redirect to the thank-you page if form is submitted and the current URL is not /thank-you } }, [isFormSubmitted, location.pathname, navigate]); const sendEmail = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); emailjs .sendForm( "service_pwvmojf", "template_ygg6k2c", form.current, "user_qGuGQyWW4uKSaHcStVUxO" ) .then( (result) => { console.log(result.text); }, (error) => { console.log(error.text); } ); e.target.reset(); setFormSubmitted(true); // Set the form submission status to true }; return ( <> Dennis Mbugua

); }
